generatedTitle: "The History of the Charlotte Hornets: The Only NBA Team without a Championship Win"

extractFactDictList.sentence: The team that has never won an NBA championship is the Charlotte Hornets (previously known as the Charlotte Bobcats).

extractFactDictList.sentence: The Hornets were established in 1988 and have a rich history in the NBA, with several playoff appearances but no championship wins.
